How to install “Comfort Accounting” Core Plugin
You can install Comfort Accounting plugin from your wordpress dashboard -> Plugins -> Add New and then search by the name. Then download the zip file from wordpress.org
the core plugin from our website and install the zip file manually from wordpress dashboard plugin manager.
